select alert.id, alert.task_name, alert.project, alert.description, plugin.name pluginName, alert.utc_alert_time alert_time from alert left join task on alert.task_id = task.id left join plugin on task.plugin_id = plugin.id
alert.is_deleted = false
and alert.task_name ilike ('%' || #{request.taskName} || '%')
and alert.project ilike ('%' || #{request.project} || '%')
order by alert.utc_alert_time desc
